channel.title: England-2026s on Sailing Lucy
channel.description: Recent content in England-2026s on Sailing Lucy

item.title: Itinerary England 2026
item.description:
At the moment, not that much is fixed yet. That will come laterâ€¦

Overview

  • The route goes from Hamburg westward, into the Solent and further west: West Country, possibly the Isles of Scilly, possibly to the Channel Islands such as Guernsey and Sark.

  • The start and end of my sailing sabbatical in 2026 are set: departure is at the beginning of June, and by the end of August I want to be back home in Hamburg.
    Whether Lucy will also be back in Hamburg by then or stay in England is not yet clear (hence the variants below).
